price: 95. kay xaqul suge mari Yallal xiibitna immay, diggah atu Yuusuf kacanuh duma abba hayte hoxat edde tanto kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
